後.definition: back; behind; rear; afterwards; after; later; post-

後事.definition: future events; and what happened next... (in fiction); funeral arrangements

後代.definition: descendant; progeny; posterity; later ages; later generations

後任.definition: successor; to take up a position subsequently as ...; (attributive) future; subsequent

後來居上.definition: (idiom) see 後來者居上|后来者居上[hou4lai2zhe3 ju1shang4]

後勁.definition: energy to continue after the initial phase of an activity; delayed effect

後半葉.definition: latter half (of a decade, century etc)

後台.definition: backstage area; behind-the-scenes supporter; (computing) back-end; background

後周.definition: Later Zhou of the Five Dynasties (951-960), centered on Shandong and Hebei, with capital at Kaifeng 開封|开封[Kai1 feng1]

後唐.definition: Later Tang of the Five Dynasties (923-936)

後坐力.definition: recoil (of a gun); backlash; reactive force

後塵.definition: lit. trailing dust; fig. sb's footsteps; course in life

後壁.definition: Houbi, a district in Tainan 台南|台南[Tai2 nan2], Taiwan

後天.definition: the day after tomorrow; life after birth (the period in which one develops through experiences, contrasted with 先天[xian1 tian1]); acquired (not innate or congenital); a posteriori

後學.definition: junior scholar or pupil in imperial China

後廚.definition: kitchen (of a restaurant or hotel etc); commercial kitchen

後影.definition: rear view; figure seen from behind; view of the back (of a person or object)

後怕.definition: lingering fear; fear after the event; post-traumatic stress

後悔莫及.definition: too late for regrets (idiom); It is useless to repent after the event.

後患無窮.definition: (idiom) there will be no end of trouble in the future

後感.definition: afterthought; reflection after an event; a review (of a movie etc)

後手.definition: defensive position (in chess); room for maneuver; a way of escape

後排.definition: the back row (in a theater etc); the rear seats (in a vehicle)

後援會.definition: support group (e.g. for an election candidate); fan club

後撤.definition: to pull back (an army); to retreat

後文.definition: the pages ahead; the following pages

後方.definition: the rear; far behind the front line

後日.definition: the day after tomorrow; from hence; from now; from now on; henceforth

後晉.definition: Later Jin of the Five Dynasties (936-946)

後會有期.definition: I'm sure we'll meet again some day. (idiom); Hope to see you again.

後會無期.definition: to meet again at unspecified date; meeting postponed indefinitely

後果自負.definition: to take responsibility for the consequences of risky behavior; to have only oneself to blame if things go badly

後梁.definition: Later Liang of the Five Dynasties (907-923)

後段.definition: final part; rear; back end; final segment; the following section; last paragraph

後海.definition: Houhai, a lake and the area surrounding it in central Beijing

後涼.definition: Later Liang of the Sixteen Kingdoms (386-403)

後漢.definition: Later Han or Eastern Han dynasty (25-220); Later Han of the Five Dynasties (947-950)

後漢書.definition: History of Eastern Han (later Han), third of the 24 dynastic histories 二十四史[Er4 shi2 si4 Shi3], composed by Fan Ye 范曄|范晔[Fan4 Ye4] in 445 during Song of the Southern Dynasties 南朝宋[Nan2 chao2 Song4], 120 scrolls

後燕.definition: Later Yan of the Sixteen Kingdoms (384-409)

後生可畏.definition: the young will be redoubtable in the years to come (idiom); the younger generations will surpass us in time

後知後覺.definition: to realize in hindsight; to realize belatedly; to be late to the party

後秦.definition: Later Qin of the Sixteen Kingdoms (384-417)

後繼乏人.definition: see 後繼無人|后继无人[hou4 ji4 wu2 ren2]

後繼有人.definition: (idiom) to have qualified successors to carry on one's undertaking

後繼無人.definition: to have no qualified successors to carry on one's undertaking

後置.definition: to place after (e.g. in grammar); postposition

後背.definition: the back (human anatomy); the back part of sth

後腳.definition: (one moment ...,) the next ...; trailing foot (in walking)

後西遊記.definition: one of three Ming dynasty sequels to Journey to the West 西遊記|西游记

後話.definition: something to be taken up later in speech or writing

後賬.definition: undisclosed account; to settle matters later; to blame sb after the event

後起之秀.definition: (idiom) an up-and-coming youngster; new talent; a brilliant younger generation

後趙.definition: Later Zhao of the Sixteen Kingdoms (319-350)

後跟.definition: heel (part of a foot); heel (of a sock); counter (the part of a shoe that cups the back of one's heel); followed by (used in describing a format, such as "filename followed by file extension")

後路.definition: escape route; retreat route; communication lines to the rear; alternative course of action; room for maneuver

後車之鑒.definition: lit. warning to the following cart (idiom); don't follow the track of an overturned cart; fig. draw lesson from the failure of one's predecessor; learn from past mistake; once bitten twice shy

後退.definition: to recoil; to draw back; to fall back; to retreat

後進.definition: less advanced; underdeveloped; lagging behind; the younger generation; the less experienced ones

後進先出.definition: to come late and leave first; last in, first out (LIFO)

後邊.definition: the back; the rear; the last bit; behind; near the end; at the back; later; afterwards

後邊兒.definition: erhua variant of 後邊|后边[hou4 bian5]

後金.definition: Later Jin dynasty (from 1616-); Manchu Khanate or kingdom that took over as Qing dynasty in 1644

後鉤兒.definition: erhua variant of 後鉤|后钩[hou4 gou1]

後門.definition: back door; back gate; (fig.) back-door influence; under-the-table dealings; anus; (computing) backdoor

後院.definition: rear court; back garden; backyard (also fig.)

後院起火.definition: a conflict arises close to home (idiom)

後面.definition: the back; the rear; the last bit; behind; near the end; at the back; later; afterwards

後頭.definition: behind; the back; the rear; later; afterwards; (in) the future

後顧之憂.definition: fears of trouble in the rear (idiom); family worries (obstructing freedom of action); worries about the future consequences; often in negative expressions, meaning "no worries about anything"

後鼻音.definition: velar nasal; consonant ng or ŋ produced in the nose with the back of the tongue against the soft palate

後龍.definition: Houlung town in Miaoli county 苗栗縣|苗栗县[Miao2 li4 xian4], northwest Taiwan

後龍鎮.definition: Houlung town in Miaoli county 苗栗縣|苗栗县[Miao2 li4 xian4], northwest Taiwan
